## Properties

| Property            | Attribute | Description       | Type                                 | Default     |
| ------------------- | --------- | ----------------- | ------------------------------------ | ----------- |

| `icon`              | `icon`    | Icon              | `string`                             | `undefined` |
| `type` _(required)_ | `type`    | Alert type        | `"danger" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `undefined` |
